name: places/ChIJrRg8WaNZwokRXVz4b54ltaw
adrFormatAddress: 147 8th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I LOVE EMPIRE CANNABIS CLUB! This store opening and me being able to visit and shop for cannabis product like any other store was amazing and a dream fulfilled for a cannabis customer. I was already to apply for the med card and came across an article about Empire. It was a great find. Everyone is knowledgeable, product line is extensive with strains and they have everything from candy to flower to drinks. Everyone is so NICE!  I love that you get an escort upon entering the store and browse freely with them as they answer all your questions. All you need is to show id to enter. If you want to buy they have 2 membership options $15 for 24hrs or $50 with $25 discount for a month. If you want a cool, nice spot to venture into the new NYC cannabis world this is a GREAT place to start. You'll buy before you leave. Thank You Empire!

originalText.text: My partner and I went in to ask questions about the membership and the type of products they had. We had the pleasure to have Chase as our budtender. Chase was the nicest and patient with us and all our questions. We ended up leaving super content and happy with our experience. Thank you chase! You made our day.

originalText.text: Third time being disappointed. Really wanted to like them, but when all you’re about is the all mighty dollar, well, you’re not all that interesting. Showed up four minutes before closing time and wasn’t allowed in, despite the fact I basically came running over.

originalText.text:
Now as a bit of a cannabis connoisseur myself NYs new legal platform interested me. So I decided to go purchasing from a dispensary since i am a cardholder. As I  looked on Google maps i came across Empire and though they arent an actual dispensary it appeared to be similar and interesting since they required no card. What they do require is membership to purchase.. basically a fee on top of whatever the price is. The fee is $15 for a 24 hr or $50 for a month long membership but you get a free $10 preroll ... which is even cheaper than their previous deal of giving $25  discount. Prices go from reasonable to unreasonable  to ridiculous after you added the membership ship fee.
The flower looked decent in display however my 1/8 was dry and partially crushed when i got it someone even told me too watch for PM based on a pic i posted.
If you already in NY itll be cheaper to stay with your connect or join a real dispensary.  This place more concerned with over charging than quality in my opinion.The staff was great tho  and the flower wasn't bad at all  just way too much and i dont mind paying for great weed but not overpaying

originalText.text:
I never leave one star reviews but this was kind of alarming to me while visiting this location. Prior to entering nothing was stated anywhere that there is a cost to be at the location of $15. My ID was scanned, and once I was aware of the fee, I requested for my information to be deleted which they told me they are not able to do so.

Privacy concerns are real and charging people to make purchases or be in your location is insane, but I understand needing to do so, but not deleting someone’s personal information is a bad move and illegal. You guys need to educate your staff.
